title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 97.6 - Separate existence of credit union organization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 97.6 - Separate existence of credit union organization

State Regulations

Every credit union organization shall be operated in a manner
which demonstrates to the public that the organization has separate corporate
existence and is operationally distinct from its member credit unions. Every
instrument which evidences a borrowing by a credit union organization shall
specifically indicate whether or not, and to what extent, its member credit
unions are liable for such borrowing. Notes

97.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
